name: What Might be Outside
description:
The game was SUPPOSED to be where your a guy who hasn't been outside of his room and traverses through his imagination of what might be outside with various dreams, but a lot of stuff didn't get done so its dialogues and 3 very bad excuses for dreams. (controls are arrows/WASD and "enter" for interaction)

I ran out of time and brainpower due to me being bad and not knowing Unity or C# that much
